sentences.en: But below the sort of solemn and respectful expression trenchant and insidious uneasiness and panic.
sentences.cn: 但是那种肃穆的表情下又分明隐伏着不安和恐慌.

sentences.en: Characteristic: Colour is trenchant, be full of nutrient value.
sentences.cn: 特点: 色彩分明, 富有营养价值.
恶意讽刺的且十分锐利的; 讽刺的.

sentences.en: Fair workers, ability to punish first, trenchant, family flourishing kingdom.
sentences.cn: 公平工人, 能力至上,奖罚分明, 兴家旺国.

sentences.en: From the structure arrangement, the emphases of this paper is trenchant.
sentences.cn: 同时在结构安排上祥略有次, 重点突出.

sentences.en: He formulated trenchant aphorisms that caught their attention.
sentences.cn: 他阐述的鲜明格言引起了人们的注意.
他是个一针见血的评论家.

sentences.en: He was shattered and bewildered by this trenchant criticism.
sentences.cn: 他因这番尖锐的批评而万念俱灰，茫然不知所措。

sentences.en: His comment was trenchant and perceptive.
sentences.cn: 他的评论既一针见血又鞭辟入里。

sentences.en: In intensity of illumination admirable by day, any colorific turns are flat and trenchant , proper.
sentences.cn: 在照度极佳的白天, 任何色彩的转折都是干脆而分明 、 恰到好处.

sentences.en: Some of their comments were quite trenchant.
sentences.cn: 他们的有些批评十分尖锐.

sentences.en: Stockman became one of the President’s most trenchant critics.
sentences.cn: 斯托克曼成了总统最尖锐的批评者之一。

sentences.en: The trenchant and inspiring comments of the scholars impressed the audience greatly.
sentences.cn: 学者们的理性思考和精彩阐释,引起了到会听众的兴趣与好评.

sentences.en: Trenchant essays can criticize contemporary abuses.
sentences.cn: 杂文言辞犀利,可以针砭世弊.

words.tran_cn: 尖刻的；锐利的；苛刻的；锋利的（名词trenchancy，副词trenchantly）

trans.tran_cn: 锐利的，简明的，有力的，清晰的
trans.tran_en: expressed very strongly, effectively, and directly without worrying about offending people
